title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The Most Recently Used (MRU) File List is not being persisted between sessions as expected.
OB:
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
SR: The MRU File List should persist between sessions. After restarting the workbench, the previously opened files should be listed in the MRU list as part of the expected behavior.
